thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 2 of 153
thread.title: Markus Maier

author: Markus Maier
title: Markus Maier
text: This was my first order on Moo and i have to say i'm absolutely impressed, the quality of my (both sided) raised spot gloss business cards is fantastic and print & cut is perfect! The price was more than reasonable and they delivered 2 days before the estimate time. The possibility to print individual designs on the back with Printfinity without any additional cost is just awesome. I'm just WOWed!! Definitely a no brainer to order my next batch here again. :)
